tweet: @1LlamaMom I definitely drench her from time to time.  Both vets said not to overdo anything as long as her famacha stays good which it is.  I try to get her some good supplemental nutrition daily as well.

name: Mike the Goat Guy 🇺🇦 #GoatasticLifeSanctuary

tweet: @1LlamaMom Archie came through the surgery very well.  I was very nervous.  I'm never excited about anesthesia and goats.  I think most young adults are good, especially if they are in good shape and healthy as possible.  I'm sure you have a good vet.  We have two on call vets.
